answerText: hypothalamus[10] This region in the anterior hypothalamus receives signals via the retinohypothalamic tract and regulates Circadian rhythms.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Editor's Packet 1 | 9 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This area of the brain can be affected by sarcoid granulomas, and its responsibilities include the interpretation of smells and the regulation of body temperature. For ten points each: [10] Identify this part of the brain located in the diencephalon just above the brainstem.
